(Simplified: 猕)
Chinese Definition:
①(獼猴)哺乳動物，猴的一種，上身皮毛灰褐色，腰部以下澄黃色，面部微紅色，尾短，四肢都像人。以野果、野菜等爲食物。古亦稱“母猴”、“沐猴”。
獼猴桃 [ mí hóu táo ]: kiwi fruit; Chinese gooseberry
獼猴 [ mí hóu ]: macaque

獼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mí］
［《廣韻》武移切，平支，明。］
［《集韻》民卑切，平支，明。］
亦作“獮2”。“猕1”的繁体字。亦作“猕1”。
见“獼猴”。

獼字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獼； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页721第11
【廣韻】武移切【集韻】民?切，?音彌。【玉篇】獼猴。【博雅】猱狙，獼猚也。　又【正字通】通雅曰：沐猴，獼猴，母猴也。【前漢·西域傳沐猴註】沐猴，卽獼猴。母音轉爲馬，又轉爲彌。方言呼母曰㜷，此其證也。獸以雌强，今獼猴亦謂其大者，猶凡物之大者曰馬，藍馬薊之類。【集韻】或作猕?。

macaque
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　 Ki; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 721 11
[Guang Yun] Wu Yiqie [Ji Yun] People? Cut, sound Mi. [Jade articles] Macaques. 【Bo Ya】Liao qi, kiyan also.　[Zhengzitong] Tongya said: Mu monkey, macaque, mother monkey. [Previous Han · Western Regions Chuan Mu Monkey Note] Mu Monkey, Macaque. The vowel is changed to horse and then to Mi. The dialect calls mother and says 㜷, this is also the proof. The beast is strong in females. Nowadays, macaques are also called their big ones, and the big ones are like horses and blue horse thistles. [Ji Yun] Or as a macaque?
